videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: This barbarian raided the entire armory.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena gameplay with a monored equipment deck, ft. Godo, Bandit Warlord (Gilgamesh) as commander in Brawl. 

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

00:00 - Intro
02:08 - Deck Tech
08:21 - vs Jenova, Ancient Calamity
12:17 - vs Lumra, Bellow of the Woods
19:27 - vs Roxanne, Starfall Savant
25:34 - vs Thalia and The Gitrog Monster
38:23 - vs Tifa Lockhart
40:46 - vs Soul of Windgrace
45:16 - vs Zoyowa Lava-Tongue

Decklist:
https://aetherhub.com/Deck/godo-bandit-warlord-brawl
